text:
Jusuf Gazibegović (born 3 March 2000) is a Bosnian football player. He plays for FC Liefering in Austrias second league as defender.
Jusuf Gazibegovic played for the football academy of FC Red Bull Salzburg from 2016 to 2018 and for the UEFA Youth League squad in 2017/18. There he scored one goal against Girondis Bordeaux. Sometimes he played also for FC Liefering.
In the 2018-19 season he plays in the regular team of Liefering.
